text:
Hi Shay nice to meet you! How are you?

Just in case - I'm most likely will be able to reply in bursts rather than "live".

A bit about myself - I've been in the industry for around 8-9 years now. I started as a generalist/modeler then slowly transitioned into lighting/lookdev. I had opportunity to be a lead as well as supervise some projects in the recent years. I mostly worked in films but I had some great time working on game cinematics/high end commercials too. At the moment I do lighting and lookdev at Framestore and I'll be happy to answer all your questions and provide you with feedback if you'll need any.
Substance is great, I never had time for designer, but I remember bringing painter to the project for the first time, it made an incredible boost in speed and quality for the BG assets
